sentences.en: Anarchy Decor: Anarchy Decor create a lot of anarchy.
sentences.cn: 混乱装饰物: 它能制造十分混乱的状态.

sentences.en: Anarchy Shrubs: These crazy shrubberies create a little bit of anarchy.
sentences.cn: 混乱的灌木丛: 杂乱的灌木丛产生一点混乱.

sentences.en: Economic anarchy scourged the post-war world.
sentences.cn: 经济混乱使得战后的世界陷入水深火热之中。

sentences.en: He is the stony - hearted expug, committed deep within him, despite all blandishments, to anarchy and loot.
sentences.cn: 他就是那个铁石心肠的前拳击家, 表面上虽然阿谀逢迎, 心底里却尽转着天下大乱, 杀人越货的念头.

sentences.en: He liked the stony - hearted expug, committed deep within him, despite all blandishments, to anarchy and loot.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢这个铁石心肠的前拳击家, 表面上虽然阿谀逢迎, 心底里却尽转着天下大乱, 杀人越货的念头.

sentences.en: In the absence of their teacher the class was in a state of anarchy.
sentences.cn: 教师不在,班上一片混乱.

sentences.en: It's going to be like today and you're going to anarchy and absolute chaos.
sentences.cn: 它会像今天一样,你就要有无秩序状态,陷入绝对的混乱当中.

sentences.en: Nature is harmony; resistance is anarchy . Nature makes favorable conditions ; excess makes trouble.
sentences.cn: 自然则和, 违反定律,就会导至纷乱; 自然则顺,矫枉过正,终将带来弊患.

sentences.en: Pirate Curfew: Increase order at the cost of some fear and anarchy.
sentences.cn: 宵禁令: 能提升order(秩序)等级但是造成Fear(恐惧)和Anarchy(混乱)等级的下降.

sentences.en: Punks: people who listen to punk music, wear leather clothes and believe in anarchy.
sentences.cn: 蓬克摇滚乐迷: 听蓬克摇滚音乐 、 穿着皮衣并且喜欢骚乱的人.

sentences.en: Random Executions: Increase fear and anarchy on your island.
sentences.cn: 随意处死岛上的人: 能提升岛上的Fear和Anarchy等级,海盗们最喜欢.

sentences.en: The classroom was in a constant state of anarchy .
sentences.cn: 教室里永远是一片混乱。

sentences.en: The prison is close to anarchy.
sentences.cn: 那所监狱几乎一片混乱。

sentences.en: This is simply bringing anarchy into the army, and flinging victory away.
We still do: living in anarchy.
sentences.cn: 我们现在仍然有这种感觉: 生活在混乱中.

words.tran_cn: 无政府的；无政府主义的；无法无天的

trans.tran_cn: 混乱，无秩序，无政府状态
trans.tran_en: a situation in which there is no effective government in a country or no order in an organization or situation
